The greatnes of the mystery of godlines; opened in severall sermons by Cuthbert Sydenham teacher to a Church of Christ at Newcastle upon Tine. Sydenham, Cuthbert, 1622-1654.
[8], 48, 47-266 p.
Printed by W. Hunt for Richard Tomlins, at the Sun and Bible neare Pye-Corner., London, : 1654.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "may 8th". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
